data.message:
I am never gonna express ma love again,
Bcos its all insane...
Writing all this again& again,
It brings me lot of pain...
What the fuck am I tryin to gain????
I know that I will never be the main.

Will drink that scotch fully plain..
Until its gets into my fuckin brain...
Till all ur memories completely drain.
I wanna get out of this fuckin chain...
Maybe I will catch a train...
Go to place where it always rain..
Bring out all the tears and the pain...
But I promise myself I will never cry again.

Never will I let my heart complain,
That I will break him again..
I promise if I fail, I cut my vein,
And get myself slain..
Wat else can I do I'm just humane...
Baby it gives me lot of mental strain..
Maybe I will work out thro' the sprain..

I will come back with a new campaign..
I will put my life in a faster lane.
There is lot of things to regain,
And I am sure I will win again..
And celebrate with a champagne..
Maybe Take my girl to Spain..

I know I will have to go thro lot of pain,
Its the feelings I will have to contain,
But this is how life will sustain..
I know u too have lot to maintain,
I hope u had good memoires to retain.
My poems weren't  just to entertain...
Its culmination of all ma feelings n pain..
Sorry girl... I can never remain,
As ur friend again...

Goodbye.
